description: Dashboard visualizes Konflux clusters loadtest RPM probe results. Related Horreum test is https://horreum.corp.redhat.com/test/372 with filter by label `.repo_type = libecpg*`.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start) AS "time",
    CASE
        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '3 hours' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '3 hours' PRECEDING)
        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '12 hours' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '12 hours' PRECEDING)
        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '1 day' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '1 day' PRECEDING)
        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '3 days' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '3 days' PRECEDING)
        ELSE (label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_mean')::DOUBLE PRECISION
    END AS "value",
    '__results_measurements_KPI_mean' as "metric"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 372
    AND label_values->>'.metadata.env.MEMBER_CLUSTER' = ${member_cluster}
    AND (label_values->>'.repo_type' LIKE 'libecpg%')
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
    AND label_values->>'.results.measurements.KPI.mean' != '-1'
ORDER BY
    start;

SELECT
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start) AS "time",
    CASE
        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '3 hours' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_errors')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '3 hours' PRECEDING)

        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '1 day' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_errors')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '1 day' PRECEDING)
        WHEN '${smoothing}' = '3 days' THEN AVG((label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_errors')::DOUBLE PRECISION) OVER (ORDER BY start RANGE '3 days' PRECEDING)
        ELSE (label_values->>'__results_measurements_KPI_errors')::DOUBLE PRECISION
    END AS "value",

FROM

WHERE

ORDER BY

SELECT
    EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM start) AS "time",
    label_values->>'__results_errors_error_reasons_simple' AS "Error reasons"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 372
    AND label_values->>'.metadata.env.MEMBER_CLUSTER' = ${member_cluster}
    AND (label_values->>'.repo_type' LIKE 'libecpg%%')
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
ORDER BY
    start DESC;

SELECT
    COALESCE(
        CASE
            WHEN label_values ? '__results_errors_error_reasons_simple' THEN
                regexp_replace(label_values->>'__results_errors_error_reasons_simple', '[0-9]+x ', '', 'g')
            ELSE
                NULL
        END,
        '') AS "Error",
    COUNT(*) AS "Count"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 372
    AND label_values->>'.metadata.env.MEMBER_CLUSTER' = ${member_cluster}
    AND (label_values->>'.repo_type' LIKE 'libecpg%%')
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
GROUP BY
    "Error"
ORDER BY
    "Error" ASC;

        ELSE (label_values->>'__results_durations_stats_platformtaskruns__build_rpmbuild_linux_s390x__passed_duration_samples')::DOUBLE PRECISION
    END AS "value",
    '__results_durations_stats_platformtaskruns__build_rpmbuild_linux_s390x__passed_duration_samples' as "metric"
FROM
    data
WHERE
    horreum_testid = 372
    AND label_values->>'.metadata.env.MEMBER_CLUSTER' = ${member_cluster}
    AND (label_values->>'.repo_type' LIKE 'libecpg%')
    AND $__timeFilter(start)
    AND label_values->>'.results.measurements.KPI.mean' != '-1'
ORDER BY
